type.Description:
Type of channel; must be one of the type listed there: 
https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/04-modality-specific-files/03-electroencephalography.html

units.Description:
Physical unit of the data values recorded by this channel in SI units (see Appendix V: Units for allowed symbols of BIDS):
https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/05-units.html

description.Description: Free-form text description of the channel, or other information of interest. Here original channel name and type.

sampling_frequency.Description: Sampling rate of the channel in Hz.
